# the0 Documentation

> the0 is an open-source algorithmic trading platform that enables developers and traders to create, test, deploy, and manage trading bots across multiple markets.

## Documentation Structure

- [Welcome to the0](/welcome-to-the0): Platform introduction and overview
- [Terminology](/terminology/): Key terms and concepts
  - [Bots](/terminology/bots): Understanding bot instances
  - [Custom Bots](/terminology/custom-bots): Bot templates and blueprints
  - [Bot Deployment](/terminology/bot-deployment): Deployment process
- [the0 CLI](/the0-cli/): Command-line interface documentation
  - [Installation](/the0-cli/installation): Install and setup
  - [Authentication](/the0-cli/authentication): API credentials
  - [Bot Commands](/the0-cli/bot-commands): Managing bot instances
  - [Custom Bot Commands](/the0-cli/custom-bot-commands): Deploying custom bots
- [Custom Bot Development](/custom-bot-development/): Build your own trading bots
  - [Quick Start Guide](/custom-bot-development/quick-start-guide): Build your first bot
  - [Overview](/custom-bot-development/overview): Development philosophy
  - [Configuration](/custom-bot-development/configuration): Bot configuration reference
  - [Bot Types](/custom-bot-development/bot-types): Scheduled vs realtime
  - [Testing](/custom-bot-development/testing): Testing strategies
  - [Deployment](/custom-bot-development/deployment): Deployment process
  - [Compliance](/custom-bot-development/compliance): Code review requirements

## Key Concepts

### Bot Types
- **Scheduled Bots**: Run on cron schedules (DCA, rebalancing)
- **Realtime Bots**: Run continuously (market making, arbitrage)

### Supported Languages
- Python 3.11+
- JavaScript/Node.js 20+

### Bot Structure
```
custom-bot/
  bot-config.yaml      # Metadata and configuration
  main.py              # Entry point
  bot-schema.json      # Parameter schema
  requirements.txt     # Dependencies
  README.md            # Documentation
```

- GitHub: https://github.com/alexanderwanyoike/the0
- Discord: https://discord.gg/g5mp57nK
